items.title: Cheltenham to reduce capacity and price of a pint
items.summary: Organisers of the Cheltenham Festival are to reduce capacity and the price of a pint following criticism from spectators.

Comcast/NBCUniversal held the No. 1 spot on KPMGâ€™s ranking of 2024 content spending among the biggest plaâ€¦

items.title: World's fastest gaming CPU, AMD's 9800X3D, hits an all-time low price of $429 at Amazon â€” Newegg offers competing bundles with motherboards, RAM, and coolers

items.title: Armagh ratify McGeeney as manager for a 12th year
